statements: UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET description = 'Explore the beautiful nature', location = 'Forest' WHERE activity_id = 1;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image.jpg', activity_name = 'Bird Watching' WHERE activity_id = 2;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET location='Forest' WHERE activity_id=1;

UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_name='Bird Watching', description='Watch various bird species in their natural habitat', image_url='https://example.com/bird-watching.jpg' WHERE activity_id=3;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_name='Hiking Trail', activity_description='Explore scenic trails in the forest' WHERE activity_id=1;
UPDATE tourist_reviews SET review_rating=5, review_comment='Amazing experience!' WHERE review_id=3;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_description = 'Enjoy bird watching in the lush green forests' WHERE activity_id = 1;
UPDATE tourist_reviews SET review_rating = 4, reviewer_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE review_id = 5;
UPDATE ecotourism_images SET image_url='new_image_url.jpg' WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_description='New and improved activity description' WHERE activity_id=5;
UPDATE ecotourism_images SET image_url = 'https://updated_image_url.com' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_description = 'New description for activity' WHERE activity_id = 2;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_description = 'A thrilling adventure for nature lovers' WHERE activity_id = 1;
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'Captivating view of the waterfall' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE ecotourism_activities SET activity_description = 'Explore the beautiful rainforest', activity_location = 'Amazon Rainforest' WHERE activity_id = 1;
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'Aerial view of the forest canopy', image_url = 'https://example.com/forest_image.jpg' WHERE activity_id = 1 AND image_id = 3;
UPDATE images SET image_url = 'http://example.com/new_image.jpg' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE activities SET description = 'Exploring the wilderness' WHERE activity_id = 2;
UPDATE images SET uploaded_at = '2022-01-05 08:00:00' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE activities SET location = 'Amazon Rainforest', description = 'Explore the beauty of the rainforest' WHERE activity_id = 1;
